content.raw:
Actually, when running locally, if I just run `UNIT_ign_TEST` it passes, but when I run `make test` it always fails, but with a different error:

~~~
51: [ RUN      ] ignTest.ServiceList
51: /media/louise/TERA/code/ign-transport4/tools/ign_TEST.cc:132: Failure
51: Value of: "/foo\n"
51: Expected: output
51: Which is: ""
51: [  FAILED  ] ignTest.ServiceList (6195 ms)
51: [ RUN      ] ignTest.ServiceInfo
51: /media/louise/TERA/code/ign-transport4/tools/ign_TEST.cc:154: Failure
51: Expected: (output.size()) > (50u), actual: 39 vs 50
51: [  FAILED  ] ignTest.ServiceInfo (1437 ms)
~~~
content.html:
